text: SRWare Iron is a Chromium-based web browser which is developed by the company SRWare. The browser aims to stop tracking and other features that compromise the privacy of users that the Google Chrome browser includes. The browser also includes some Chromium privacy options turned on by default, and some more features that Google Chrome does not have. == Criticism == In December 2014, Lifehacker said that Iron offers little that is not possible by simply configuring Google Chrome's privacy settings. However, the_simple_computer wrote that Iron removes the Google Native Client, Google's custom navigation and error pages and other similar features. == References == Category:Web browsers
title: SRWare Iron
